title: Playing lane Vi against a Yasuo.
body:
He dashes to me. I auto attack him twice and he dashes away. Every time he does this I end up doing more damage than him.

We hit level 2. He dashes to me. I auto him, q him, auto him and ignite. He flashes but dies.

Say "idiot" in all chat because honestly wtf was he thinking.

Got reported for that by his team.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v71c6NDs5VI
